items.name: Nyanza Contemporary Art Hub
items.short_description: A vibrant space showcasing modern and contemporary East African art, featuring rotating exhibitions and artist workshops. It's a must-visit for art lovers seeking fresh perspectives.

items.name: Dunga Waterfront Eatery & Lounge
items.short_description: Enjoy breathtaking sunsets over Lake Victoria with exquisite local and international cuisine. This multi-level complex offers fine dining, a casual bistro, and live music nights.

items.name: Kisumu Green Oasis Park
items.short_description: A newly developed urban eco-park focusing on indigenous plant species and sustainable design. Features walking trails, picnic spots, and a small educational center on local biodiversity.

items.name: Kids' Planet Discovery Centre Kisumu
items.short_description: An interactive learning and play space designed for children aged 2-12. With science exhibits, creative play zones, and storytelling sessions, it's perfect for curious young minds.

items.name: SkyVue Rooftop Lounge
items.short_description: Offering panoramic views of Kisumu city and Lake Victoria, this upscale lounge is the perfect spot for evening cocktails and gourmet bites. Known for its stylish ambiance and vibrant DJ sets.

items.name: Nyakach Artisans Village
items.short_description: A bustling market and workshop complex dedicated to showcasing and selling authentic handcrafted items from the Nyanza region. Find unique souvenirs, textiles, and traditional crafts.

items.name: Lakeside Tech-Tonic Hub
items.short_description: More than just a co-working space, this hub fosters innovation with regular tech workshops, startup mentorship, and a vibrant community cafe open to the public.

items.name: The Reader's Nook Kisumu
items.short_description: A cozy haven for book lovers and coffee enthusiasts. Browse a curated selection of African literature, enjoy artisanal coffee, and participate in regular book club meetings and author readings.

items.name: Pendo Boutique Hotel & Spa
items.short_description: An elegantly designed boutique hotel offering a tranquil escape. Its contemporary spa and infinity pool are open to non-guests for a day pass, providing a luxurious relaxation experience.

items.name: Grand Nyanza Adventure Park
items.short_description: Get your adrenaline pumping at Kisumu's newest outdoor adventure park! Featuring ziplines, high ropes courses, wall climbing, and team-building challenges for all ages.
